item.description:
Dinner & Drinks before the Together Dance at the Castleton

Saturday Nov. 24th. 5 pm. to 7:30 pm.

The Common Man Restaurant

88 Range rd. off of rt. 111, at the rt. 93 exit 3. Windham, NH. 03087

http://www.allmenus.com/nh/windham/32344-the-common-man-restaurant/menu/

Host: Steve Ob1. 603-491-1962Â  ob@tds.net

Please join Steve Ob1. for dinner and drinks before the Dance. We plan to be there at 5 pm. to get seats and tables. The Common Man does not take reservations. So, what people we have at 5 pm. will be the seats we have. But, if you are late. We will have you join us and make room for you. Steve Ob1. will be there for dinner and to introducing everyone. After dinner, we will head over a mile away to the Castleton for the Dance.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve Ob1. or Meetup, & look for the Meetup signs on our tables.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dinner & Drinks before the Dancing
